metadata.title: CVE-2017-12993 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
The Juniper protocols parser in tcpdump before 4.9.2 has a buffer over-readin print-juniper.c, several functions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12993` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpdump - 4.9.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpdump package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.9.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.1').
